title: Sirloin steak with brandy peppercorn sauce
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons crushed black peppercorns', '2 (225g) sirloin steaks', '1 tablespoon lemon pepper seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '75g butter', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '125ml red wine', '3 tablespoons brandy', '4 tablespoons chopped spring onions', '1 shallot, chopped', '120ml double cream', '1 teaspoon sugar']
